summary: adds a brand new shout to skyrim
descriptionHtml:
ever wanted a shout of true destruction, well this shout does just that.
this shout combines the following shouts into a balanced shout.
1. Unrelenting Force
2. Fire Breath
3. Frost Breath
4. Ice Form
if its a little too overpowered let me know

installation: drop the esp and the batch file in the skyrim data folder

before you go into the game, you must find the shout.txt batch file and change the first to letters of the id to the load order of this esp file, if this works for you then do the batch file or do this 
help \"Vol\"
Help \"Ag\"
help \"Riik\"
player.teachword ID
player.unlockword ID
author: Intuz0keizaal
